name: AiLaTrieuPhu
0:
”Alexa, open my game”
”Alexa, start my game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my game
des:
Ai La Trieu Phu game in Vietnamese with 15 questions, each question has 4 answers.

+ Ask "Alexa, open my game" to start the game.
+ Say A, B, C, D or 1, 2, 3, 4 to answer the question
+ Say "Alexa, repeat" to repeat the question
+ Say "Fifty-fifty" for fifty-fifty help
+ Say "Consulting" for consulting team help.

If you like and support this skill, we will add more features to the game:
+ adding features: consulting team
+ add new 100+ questions
+ adding features to save player achievements
+ adding player rankings feature.

Come play every day to see how far you can go. Are you ready to become the winner?

Dan Nguyen - Alexa Echo Vietnam group.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
